name: REFRACTION
description: This pattern was using a mix of physical and digital printing techniques. Initally, pigments were open screen printed onto paper, then the resulting marks were photographed and taken into Adobe Photoshop where it was made into a repeat and digitally enhanced.

name: CELLULAR
description: An all over repeating design focusing on the magnification of human cells. Rendered by hand using watercolours and altered digitally.

name: PSYCHEDELLIC CELLS
description: Created by digitally mainpulating an open screen procion print based on the unique structure of a human hair cell.

name: RIBBED
description: An all over, colourful print created by digitally manipulating medical imagery in Adobe Photoshop.

name: GLITCHED
description: A glitch effect tile print created using physical mark making and digital manipulation.

name: CAGED
description: A four layered design screen printed onto stitched leather; the flourecent colourways are intended to 'glow' when displayed in blue lighting.

name: HANDY
description: A two layered design focusing on both the bones and veins found in the hand. The design was hand drawn, scanned and edited.

name: WATERCOLOURS
description: Originally a placement watercolour design which was digtally altered to create an all over repeat - inspired by the wacky designs often found on buses and train seating.

name: HYPER WAVES
description: A bright, layered design created using just one marker, which was digitally altered to create a fun, layered pattern.

name: SCRAPE
description: Made using otherwise wasted screen printing pigment, digitally altered and layred to produce various colourways.

name: OIL SPILL
description: A colourful, over the top design created by digitally manipulating dyed fabric, with the intention of bringing hyperbrights into interior furnishings.

name: HOMETOWN
description: An entirely digitally designed print highlighting some of my favourite elements of my unoffical hometown, Rugby. Shown in a range of single colours, as well as layered over my other designs.

name: BUBBLES
description: A less hectic print which started with motifs generated from slate and twigs. Intended to be fun and playful, and capture the iridecent colours of bubbles.

name: CUTESY FLORALS
description: An all over mini print intended for use on childrens wear. The motifs were initially made using collaged disperse printing, and the pattern was created in Adobe Photoshop.
